trans-unit.source: Represents the base functionality for all menus.

Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> replace and add functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
This class is the base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é a classe base para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar uma instância dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The menus for an application consist of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os menus para consist um aplicativo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: These can contain other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects, representing submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Eles podem conter outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos, que representa os itens de submenu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects can be stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that is used to display shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos podem ser armazenados em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> para exibição como uma estrutura de menu inteiro para um formulário ou uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> que é usado para exibir menus de atalho.

trans-unit.source: This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece funcionalidade comum para todas as classes de menu.

trans-unit.source: Unlike many base classes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de muitas classes base, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> classe usa suas classes derivadas para definir muitas de suas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A> property to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver usando o menu em um aplicativo de interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI), você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A> propriedade para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> que exibe uma lista de formulários filho MDI abertos em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property contains a list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects stored in the menu class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade contém uma lista de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos armazenados na classe de menu.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, this property contains all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, esta propriedade contém todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos que são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property represents the submenu items associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade representa os itens de submenu associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> class also provides methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together.
trans-unit.target: Além das propriedades que são fornecidas para todas as classes derivadas de menu, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> classe também fornece métodos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, que permitem que você crie novos menus de menus existentes e também o menu de mesclagem duas estruturas juntos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> class also defines the nested class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> classe também define a classe aninhada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This class defines the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe define a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos usados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection> class to add and remove menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection> classe para adicionar e remover itens de menu de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, to create a menu structure for a form.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir usa a classe derivada, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, para criar uma estrutura de menu para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The example code adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> representar o item de menu de nível superior, adiciona um item de submenu para selecionar um tamanho de fonte e, em seguida, adiciona dois itens de submenu para esse item de menu que representam as opções de fonte de grande e pequeno em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> object named `mainMenu1` and four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que haja um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> objeto chamado `mainMenu1` e quatro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos nomeados `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, e `menuItem4`.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> containing the objects to add to the menu.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> class.
Since <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is an abstract class, only inherited classes can call the Menu constructor.
trans-unit.target: Como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> é uma classe abstrata, somente classes herdadas podem chamar o construtor de Menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> to copy.
Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> that is passed as a parameter to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" />.
This method copies the entire list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects (stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Esse método copia toda a lista de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos (armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> passado para `menuSrc`) para o menu atual.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in your derived class to clone <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método em sua classe derivada para clonar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: They can then be reused by other classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, podem ser reutilizadas por outras classes que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: This example creates a main menu, `mainMenu1`, with three menu items: `File`, `Edit`, and `View`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria um menu principal, `mainMenu1`, com três itens de menu: `File`, `Edit`, e `View`.

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> method to copy `mainMenu1` into `mainMenu2`.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> método para copiar `mainMenu1` em `mainMenu2`.

trans-unit.source: The cloned menu is then assigned to the form and displayed.
trans-unit.target: Menu clonado é atribuído ao formulário e exibido.

trans-unit.source: This program requires that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Este programa requer que você já tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" />.
A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" />.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> para a memória estava ocupando pode ser recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> está usando não será liberada até que as chamadas de coleta de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> destruidor do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem(System.Int32,System.IntPtr)" /> method should search for a handle.
The type of item to use to find the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
The item to use to find the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that contains the value specified.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that matches value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.

To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a handle, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> field as the type, and the handle of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Para procurar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> usando um identificador, passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> campo como o tipo e o identificador do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> você deseja localizar como valor.

trans-unit.source: To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a shortcut, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> field as the type, and the Shortcut value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Para procurar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> usando um atalho, passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> campo como o tipo e o valor de atalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> você deseja localizar como valor.

trans-unit.source: for controls to call this method.
trans-unit.target: controles chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: The merge order position for the menu item to be merged.
Returns the position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.
The position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.

The merge order of a menu item specifies the relative position that this menu item will assume if the menu structure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is contained in is merged with another.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de mesclagem de um item de menu Especifica a posição relativa que este item de menu assumirá se o menu de estrutura que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> está contida no é mesclado com outro.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem(System.Int32,System.IntPtr)" /> method should search for a shortcut.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" /> that contains this menu.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu" /> that contains this menu.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that this menu is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você obtenha uma referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> nesse menu contido no.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna `null` se o menu não está contido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ocorrer se o menu estiver contido em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, ou se o menu não está contido em nenhum menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar se um menu está sendo usado e também para determinar onde.

trans-unit.source: In this example, you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.GetContextMenu%2A> method to obtain a reference to the shortcut menu that contains `menuItem1` or `menuItem2`, and display the shortcut menu information in a message box.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.GetContextMenu%2A> método para obter uma referência para o menu de atalho que contém `menuItem1` ou `menuItem2`e exibir as informações de menu de atalho em uma caixa de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: You programmatically create a shortcut menu with two items, `New` and `Open`.
trans-unit.target: Você criar programaticamente um menu de atalho com dois itens, `New` e `Open`.

trans-unit.source: You then add functionality to these items by creating the appropriate event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adicionar funcionalidade a esses itens Criando manipuladores de eventos apropriados.

trans-unit.source: When you run the example, you get a message box that tells you to right-click the form in order to display the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Quando você executa o exemplo, você recebe uma caixa de mensagem que informa com o botão direito do formulário para exibir o menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Then, when you click a menu item, you get another message that tells which item has been clicked and displays the information on the containing shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, quando você clica em um item de menu, você receberá outra mensagem informa qual item é clicado e exibe as informações no menu de atalho que contém.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você já tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that contains this menu.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that contains this menu.
This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> this menu is currently located in.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você obtenha uma referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> este menu está localizado no momento.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna `null` se o menu não está contido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ocorrer se o menu estiver contido em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, ou se o menu não está contido em nenhum menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar se um menu está sendo usado e também para determinar onde.

trans-unit.source: This example declares a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, `mainMenu1`, and four menu items, `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo declara um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, `mainMenu1`e quatro itens de menu, `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, e `menuItem4`.

trans-unit.source: Only the first three menu items are added to `mainMenu1` for display.
trans-unit.target: Somente os primeiros itens de três menu são adicionados ao `mainMenu1` para exibição.

trans-unit.source: The program then checks to see if `menuItem3` is being used, which is `true`, and determines the form in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: O programa, em seguida, verifica se `menuItem3` estiver sendo usado, que é `true`e determina a forma em que ele é usado.

trans-unit.source: A label text is used to display the name of the form that hosts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Um texto de rótulo é usado para exibir o nome do formulário que hospeda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: If you change the menu item being tested to `menuItem4`, the condition evaluates to `false` because `menuItem4` has never been used.
trans-unit.target: Se você alterar o item de menu está sendo testado `menuItem4`, a condição for avaliada como `false` porque `menuItem4` nunca tiver sido usado.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `MyForm` that includes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> named `label1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `MyForm` que inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> chamado `label1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the window handle for the menu.
The HMENU value of the menu.
trans-unit.target: O valor HMENU do menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the handle to the menu to perform special operations to the menu outside of the functionality provided by this class or its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para obter o identificador do menu para executar operações especiais ao menu fora a funcionalidade fornecida por essa classe ou suas classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu contains any menu items.
This property is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if this menu contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se esse menu contém <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objetos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are assigned to this menu.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para determinar se alguma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos são atribuídos a esse menu.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a verificação de `null` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> com dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.IsParent%2A> property to determine whether `mainMenu1` contains menu items.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.IsParent%2A> propriedade para determinar se `mainMenu1` contém itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: If the condition evaluates `true`, it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to `true` and binds the main menu to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Se a condição for avaliada `true`, ele define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade `true` e associa o menu principal para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> created that is named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> criado nomeada `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that is used to display a list of multiple document interface (MDI) child forms.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> that represents the menu item displaying a list of MDI child forms that are open in the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> que representa o item de menu que exibe uma lista dos formulários filho MDI abertos no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> has been specified to display the list of open child windows in an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> foi especificado para exibir a lista de janelas filho aberto em um aplicativo MDI.

trans-unit.source: To use a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> as an MDI list, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to be used.
trans-unit.target: Para usar um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> como uma lista MDI, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects associated with the menu.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection" /> that represents the list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection" /> que representa a lista de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> armazenados no menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para obter uma referência à lista de itens de menu que estão atualmente armazenados no menu.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property contains the entire menu structure in the control.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> objetos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade contém a estrutura inteira do menu no controle.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property contains the list of submenu items associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade contém a lista de itens de submenu associados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Com a referência à coleção de itens de menu para o menu (fornecida por essa propriedade), você pode adicionar e remover itens de menu, determinar o número total de itens de menu e limpar a lista de itens de menu da coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manter a coleção de itens de menu em um menu, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> documentação.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, and adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> object to its collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria uma instância da classe derivada, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objeto à sua coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que o método definido neste exemplo está localizado dentro da classe de um formulário e chamado por um método na classe desse formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> whose menu items are merged with the menu items of the current menu.
Merges the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects of one menu with the current menu.
This method merges <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects from one menu with the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Esse método mescla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos de um menu com o menu atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are merged according to the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objetos são mesclados de acordo com os valores da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: Mesclagem de menu é feito normalmente para mesclar os menus de um formulário pai de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI) com aqueles seu formulário de filho MDI ativo.

trans-unit.source: This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito automaticamente pelo common language runtime do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um formulário pai MDI contém um conjunto de menus para manipular arquivos e também o formulário filho MDI tem itens de menu relacionados ao arquivo, os conjuntos de menu mesclará automaticamente em um menu de arquivo único definido quando o formulário filho é exibido no formulário pai MDI.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> método se você estiver mesclando duas estruturas de menu que não fazem parte de um aplicativo MDI.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can be called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes to merge two or more objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação pode ser chamada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes para mesclar dois ou mais objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.

trans-unit.source: To merge two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para mesclar duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> por objetos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: This example creates two menus, `mainMenu1` and `mainMenu2`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria dois menus, `mainMenu1` e `mainMenu2`.

trans-unit.source: The first menu contains one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, `File`, and the second contains one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, `Edit`.
trans-unit.target: No primeiro menu contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, `File`, e o segundo contém uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, `Edit`.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> method, `mainMenu2` is merged with `mainMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> método `mainMenu2` é mesclada com `mainMenu1`.

trans-unit.source: When displayed, `mainMenu1` will contain the two menu items, `File` and `Edit`.
trans-unit.target: Quando exibido, `mainMenu1` conterá os itens de dois menu, `File` e `Edit`.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chamado `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.
Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" />.
A string representing the name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome.

trans-unit.source: At design time, this property is set to the programmatic identifier of the control.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de design, essa propriedade é definida como o identificador programático do controle.

trans-unit.source: However, this property has no bearing on the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, essa propriedade não possui o controle em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
Processes a command key.
<see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets user-defined data associated with the control.
An object representing the data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa os dados.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> control.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.ToString%2A> method returns a <xref:System.String> that includes the type and the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.ToString%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.String> que inclui o tipo e o número de itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> propriedade do controle.
